I was looking for pants that I could dress up or down. These fit the bill perfectly. The fabric is light and flowy. I'm 5'4", and the hem hits the top of my foot. The elastic waistband hides flaws in the hips and thighs without looking bulky. I washed them in the cold water delicate cycle and hung them to dry. There was no shrinkage. Highly recommend.

I normally fit into an 16/18 and the XL fit well. I like the palazzo pant style and these are very cute! The flower print is subtle and the background is a cream and not a pure white. The material is soft and it’s stretchy to sit and move around. The material is thin so I needed to make sure my undergarments are the right color. They sit at my waist and not my hips which is more comfortable.  I like to dress them up or keep it casual because they work for both. Wash on gentle and I prefer to let them air dry.
Very nice, soft fabric for summer. Cute pants but the waist is just too high.
Very comfortable over recent surgery on leg.
Very comfortable, and the material is excellent. Unfortunately the pockets stick out so they look weird and they’re also very large. I keep washing AND drying them so they’ll shrink.
Love the pants. Very high wasted. Comfortable. Get for travel. Great quality. Fit to size. Was just as described.
I always wear a small, but these are short. I’m 5’5”.

Not as dressy as I hoped for, very wrinkled but good for lounging around The house  Good stretch in waist and very flowing but for some reason the crotch is too low on me, even when I hike them up above my belly button but for lounging around the house they are fine. Could just be my body shape. I have a long torso.
Beautiful colors and material is nice.  But,  the length is too short and the size was smaller than expected.
I purchased these pants for a trip to Italy. Thought they looked fashionable as well as comfortable and I was right on both counts! I love how they look and love then”trendy” length!

These are the best pants I’ve found in a long time. The length is perfect and for my 4’10” self. The elastic waist is nice and tight but doesn’t cut into me. I adore the addition of the added string tie as well for extra protection. The pockets are nice and large. They are perfect for summer and spring and early fall. Where I live I would probably need to wear leggings under them if I tried to wear them in the late fall or winter. I get compliments every time I wear them.

评论概述: PITY THAT THE SELLER ERASED THE PRICE

These pants are super comfortable and I like that they are cotton.
Cute and comfy palazzo pants. Fabric is soft, comfortable and breathable. Fits great. Waist has plenty of stretch. I am 5”3 and these are perfect length for me.
These are super comfortable and look great too! Like them more than I expected to and I don’t need to hem them either… oniy bummer is that they need ironing.

These pants are so bright and truly you can change the color of the top you wear the next time and still get compliments! They run a bit large yet for Summer that just makes them cooler! Washed by hand and hung them to dry and they came out perfectly… more prints please!
These are very cute, light weight but well structured. The material is a good quality and holds its shape well when wearing. The color is true to the color on the website and looks great.

If you want them to fit like the photo, you’ll need to order a size up.  Super thin fabric (which is great for hot summer days). I haven’t washed them as yet, but plan to wash in cold water & air dry. They seem like they would shrink with any other wash/dry method.  I still like them & didn’t feel dumb wearing them.
Comfortable. Perfect fit. Gorgeous teal. Liked it so much, I ordered it in black, too.

评论概述: YESNO Women Summer Boho Palazzo Pants 2024: Elegant and Comfortable
评论详情: The YESNO Women Summer Boho Palazzo Pants offer a blend of style and comfort that makes them a standout choice for casual wear. Here’s a closer look at what makes these pants a favorite:  Soft and Breathable Fabric: Made from cotton, these palazzo pants are soft to the touch and provide excellent breathability. This makes them ideal for staying comfortable during warmer weather.  Elegant Floral Print: The floral print is both elegant and demure, adding a touch of sophistication to your outfit. It’s perfect for those who appreciate a stylish yet understated look.  High Waist Design: The high waist adds a flattering silhouette and provides additional comfort. It helps in creating a more streamlined and elegant appearance.  Wide Leg Cut: The wide-leg design not only offers a relaxed fit but also enhances comfort and ease of movement. It’s perfect for lounging or casual outings.  Convenient Pockets: The inclusion of pockets adds a practical element, allowing you to carry small essentials with ease.  Versatile Wear: These pants are versatile enough to be dressed up or down, making them suitable for various occasions, from casual days out to relaxed evenings at home.  Final Thoughts: The YESNO Women Summer Boho Palazzo Pants combine softness, breathability, and a chic floral print, making them one of your favorite pairs of designer pants. Their high waist, wide leg cut, and pockets enhance both style and functionality, making them a great addition to your wardrobe.
Cute and comfy but very short. Were mid calf on me at 5’10.
I love these pants. So comfortable for these very warm summer days. I will wear this with my beautiful Valentino gold sandals.  👍

You can dress it up of down, wear it with delicate heals or everyday sandal flats, even hiking boots would make a striking statement.  This pair of pants is comfortable cottony and cool to wear. I love them.
I bought the wrong size for me though, so ordered a different size.  Material's pattern is great for using multiple blouses or t-shirts. There are so many colors in the material to choose from.
Save your time and money!  These pants are cheap scratchy material and do not flow as described.  They are very short as well.  I do not recommend!
These pants are very lightweight and comfortable to wear. The design is very pretty and have a bit of a boho feel to them. They shrink a little in the wash, so size up if you prefer them looser.

评论概述: High waist makes them short in length
评论详情: Love the lightweight material, but they are short due to high waist.
Darker colors than shown, unflattering fit, all around a poor choice.

I knew it was a risk to dry them but honestly I don't want clothes that are fussy which is why I love cotton. unfortunately at 5'9" the shrinkage brought them to an unwearable length. If you're under 5'7" it would probably work. Otherwise I love them.

These fall colors on these pants are a must have!! Paired with a hip length tight pumpkin colored tank top (not tucked in)! Ordering more colors asap Will pair with a Jean jacket once the weather cools off. 5'7" 190lbs

评论概述: I am 5’ 4” and they size medium was too  short
评论详情: Too short! Otherwise liked them

My favorite thing about these pants is the colors in the beautiful print, bright orange and deep blue. They are very wide and I’m not sure they flatter me, but they sure are comfortable.  The fabric is cool to the touch, so wearing them is a breeze during the summer.

评论概述: Love Love Love these Lounge Pants
评论详情: Such a vibrant color that has NOT faded through multiple washes. These are wide-leg and so comfortable. Lightweight and airy. Have a high elastic waist band along with a drawstring for more customized fit. I’m 5’2” and these are the perfect length. Great for hanging out in comfort. Pretty enough to wear out - perfect cruise-wear and pairs nicely with a solid shirt. Recommended.

These comfortable pants are great for summer weather.  Be careful to pair with the right top though or you run the risk of not only feeling like you are wearing your jammies you might look like it too.  Fit is to size.
Comfy and fun to wear.  Lightweight and great for summer nights

I'm in love with the print on these pants! The textured look makes them eye-catching. They fit how I thought they would, but I'm not sure they're my style. Maybe they'd look better on someone else. The fabric is super light and breezy, which is great for hot days. I feel cool wearing them. Even though they aren't perfect on me, I still like how pretty they are. If you're into fun prints and comfy clothes, you might want to give these a try.

评论概述: Comfortable and flattering but thin, and pockets a bit small.
评论详情: I am 5'2", usually size 12, and I got the Large size. It fit with a few inches to spare around the butt (not too tight; just slightly loose) and the waist elastic was comfortable. They draped nicely and were flattering, but the length was _almost_ too much. With my thicker sandals (1" wedge) they just skim the ground, which is fine, but low flats would make them a hair too long. (If I hem them up, I'd have to extend the side slit, which does look nice and helps them drape nicely across shoes, but that does not look difficult.) IMO, they would be a good length for people up to about 5'5". I think they might look short on taller folks, but that is the current trend, I suppose...your choice. In this larger size, they do not flare like they do on the skinny model in the photo; they are basically just a wide straight leg, but they look fine that way.  The fabric is very thin, and probably not durable, but is breezy and light. I got black, so no worries about show-through, but with a lighter color, I would probably choose skin-colored underwear. The pockets (front only, no back), are comfortable as hand-pockets or for small items, but just barely deep enough for a phone; I would be concerned that it might slide out if seated.

I was expecting cotton and although the label say cotton, they're  not. They're definitely polyester with maybe a tiny bit of cotton and I mean a tiny bit. They are comfortable though and very flowy. The colors are beautiful. Haven't laundered them yet, but I would suggest cold water tumble dry low.  I think they should have a price point of $20.00 and not $29.00.  For reference I am 5'3", 175lbs. They're about an inch too long.  I hate to say this, but they are cheaply made.

Love these pants. I got the pink as depicted in the stock photo, and they are the color I expected them to be. They also run true to size- they fit well in the waist area but are not tight around the bottom area. The legs are wide and flowy but the material is not see-through (so often an issue with lightweight pants)- these are perfect for summer when you want your legs covered but don't want to sweat in tight jeans or heavy materials.  I saw a few reviews that said theirs shrunk- I haven't had that issue, but I also have not put mine in the dryer. I washed one time on the regular hot cycle and once on the cold cycle, hanging them to dry. They do get quite wrinkly, so I do have to steam them before wear. So far, they fit the same as the first time I got them, so maybe keep them out of the dryer.  Overall, big fan!
These pants are very lightweight and comfortable enough to wear anywhere, even in hot weather. The size fit great and as expected.

Loving the teal background with these printed pants. They are super comfy, especially on a hot day when you can’t wear shorts to an event, didn’t feel like shaving or want a change from leggings or tailored pants.  They’re perfect to wear back to the office, running errands, lounging around or out to dinner. The top & shoes will determine how dressy you want to make these pants.  Palazzo pants have a generous cut & I usually get a large, but got these in a medium and still have plenty of room in these pants. I’m 5’3” & 150, the length is perfect and I could wear these with flats and wedges.

These are very comfortable.  I ordered a size up, but don't think I needed to.  Love the pockets.  Mine have been through two wears and washings now and make a nice addition for 'wear all day' comfort clothing.

I like that these pants are all cotton, and I love the print. However, they run large. Very large. They are supposed to be loose-fitting, which is what I want from pants like this, but these are huge. I ordered my normal size (medium), and they are way too big. The crotch hangs very low. I can roll the waistband to get them to fit a little better, but then they're just a little too short.  I may end up wearing them around the house as lounge pants, but I doubt I'll wear them anywhere else.

I washed these as soon as they arrived - always with new fabric.... They washed well and I tried them on - so cozy and perfect length! I'm 5'6" and they just come to my heel - , the L is perfect and the drawstring is a nice touch too. Love the green floral pattern - perfect for around my house and lounge days.... But I also found these were fun to dress up with a knit tank, some fun jewelry and sandals....  I brought them to the beach as bottoms to go from the beach to the boardwork - perfect!!!!
The fabric needed a good wash to make it feel soft. But, it is nice, lightweight fabric. Very flow. Nice wide waist line to make it comfortable. You could wear these casually or dress them up.
These pants are comfy and I love the print! They are made from quality fabric and the waistband is stretchy. I love the flow y look of the pant legs. These are cool and comfortable for the summer.

These are gonna be one of my go to pants. They are very soft and comfortable. I got the XL because I'm losing weight, and they still fit great. (Current dress size 18, waist about 34in, and hips with fupa 40in). Even my daughter can wear it (size 12). So the stretch is awesome, and rhe drawstring a bonus.

The pants are 100% cotton. They are lightweight and thin but you cannot see through them at all. They are very comfortable and they feel cool to the touch. The stitching is really good and the hem line is nice, with a small slit at the bottom of each pant leg. The waistband is elastic but it does not roll so it’s flat even after machine washing. The drawstring is free flowing so make sure to tie it before machine washing just to make sure it doesn’t come out.  The fit is true to size. They are a perfect length for someone that is 5 feet 9 inches tall. They flex well when lounging, they do not seem to wrinkle as much as I thought they might and the design printed on the material is well done.  Since they are cotton, they do not stretch like other material so select your size accordingly. They are a little baggy in the legs like they are meant to be. Also, make sure to only wash them in cold water so they do not shrink.  These are nice pants at a good price point. They are versatile, so you can dress them up or dress them down depending on the event. Because of how well they are made and their comfort level I do recommend them.

评论概述: Pretty - but beware the belly bulge!
评论详情: These are very pretty and extremely thin. They flow nicely in the legs. However - I carry all my weight around my belly. I'm 5'3" and 200 pounds. These have a comfortable elastic waist, and from there the material is ample. This causes a gaping bulge from the waist to the top of my legs. It sort of poofs with air, making these pants very unflattering. This is pretty standard with this style, but I was hoping these were different. If you don't carry a spare tire around your middle, these might work for you.

I'm 7 months pregnant and I need to get more maternity clothes. The challenge is that I wanted items that I can also wear after baby is born.  I was very excited for these pants. I fell in love with the style, design, and color. They have an elastic waist but they also have drawstring. The two issues I have with the pants are first off, the style. They look like a completely different fabric than what is pictured in product images. The fabric isn't as drapey and flowy andthe legs aren't as wide and loose. The other problem is the length. They are shorter than I expected and the inseam is short. I do like them and I think they will work well for me, at least a little while longer. For reference, I ordered the L but my usual size would be a M (size 6 to 8)

These pants from the YESNO store are very comfortable to wear, great for summer days. The material is 100% cotton. I got the floral 260 color, which is nice and elegant, appropriate to wear at work or for other daily wear. They washed well in the washing machine with cold water, normal cycle, but they shrank a little, maybe since I also used them in the dryer. My washing machine does both cold and dryer cycles, and it is inconvenient to place these pants alone in the washing only cycle with no dryer, as recommended. They still fit well, but they are not as long as I needed. For reference, my weight is 220 pounds, and my height is 5 feet and 10 inches. I got the pants in size extra large. Overall, I am pleased with these pants and I would recommend them!

I love these summer boho pants. They can work for a quick shopping trip or lounging around the house.  They are as comfortable as they look. I’m only 5”4’ and didn’t feel that this made me look shorter. They were the perfect length for a pair of flats or sneakers.
